channel.title: Question about allies
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Question about allies" - If I level up...

item.title: Re: Question about allies
item.content:encoded:
Yep, it's exactly like that.
And that includes Ro, Stalkergirl and Pinky don't count as 'normal' girls when you make a team. So there's no girl-power-team anymore using lvl2 allies.

item.title: Question about allies
item.content:encoded:
Now, I can level up an ally, but what happens to the teams in wich is part, you can't do it any more (If I level up Lil' Shammy, do I lose the Ro-Sham-Bo bonus until I can make the Ro-Sham-Bo Redux formation?).
I ask this in order to wait until I can level up all three.
